verses.verse: בַּחֹ֙דֶשׁ֙ <WH2320> ba-Cho-desh month הַשְּׁלִישִׁ֔י <WH7992> hash-she-li-Shi, In the third לְצֵ֥את <WH3318> le-Tzet were gone forth בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> be-nei- when the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> me-'E-retz out of the land מִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> mitz-Ra-yim; of Egypt בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> bai-Yom the same day הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> haz-Zeh, they בָּ֖אוּ <WH935> Ba-'u came מִדְבַּ֥ר <WH4057> mid-Bar they [into] the wilderness סִינָֽי׃ <WH5514> si-Nai. of Sinai

וַיִּסְע֣וּ <WH5265> vai-yis-'U For they were departed מֵרְפִידִ֗ים <WH7508> me-re-fi-Dim, from Rephidim וַיָּבֹ֙אוּ֙ <WH935> vai-ya-Vo-'u and were come מִדְבַּ֣ר <WH4057> mid-Bar [to] the desert סִינַ֔י <WH5514> si-Nai, of Sinai וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <WH2583> vai-ya-cha-Nu and had pitched בַּמִּדְבָּ֑ר <WH4057> bam-mid-Bar; in the wilderness וַיִּֽחַן־ <WH2583> vai-yi-chan- camped שָׁ֥ם <WH8033> sham and there יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El and there Israel נֶ֥גֶד <WH5048> Ne-ged front הָהָֽר׃ <WH2022> ha-Har. before the mount

וּמֹשֶׁ֥ה <WH4872> u-mo-Sheh And Moses עָלָ֖ה <WH5927> 'a-Lah went up אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> ha-'E-lo-Him; unto God וַיִּקְרָ֨א <WH7121> vai-yik-Ra called אֵלָ֤יו <WH413> 'e-Lav and to יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Yah-weh and the LORD מִן־ <WH4480> min- from הָהָ֣ר <WH2022> ha-Har unto him out of the mountain לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> le-Mor, saying כֹּ֤ה <WH3541> koh Thus תֹאמַר֙ <WH559> to-Mar Thus shalt thou say לְבֵ֣ית <WH1004> le-Veit to the house יַעֲקֹ֔ב <WH3290> ya-'a-Ko, of Jacob וְתַגֵּ֖יד <WH5046> ve-tag-Geid and tell לִבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> liv-Nei the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel

אַתֶּ֣ם <WH859> 'at-Tem you רְאִיתֶ֔ם <WH7200> re-'i-Tem, Ye have seen אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher what עָשִׂ֖יתִי <WH6213> 'a-Si-ti what I did לְמִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4713> le-mitz-Ra-yim; Egyptian וָאֶשָּׂ֤א <WH5375> va-'es-Sa and [how] I bare אֶתְכֶם֙ <WH853> 'et-Chem עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- and כַּנְפֵ֣י <WH3671> kan-Fei wings נְשָׁרִ֔ים <WH5404> ne-sha-Rim, you on eagles' וָאָבִ֥א <WH935> va-'a-Vi and brought אֶתְכֶ֖ם <WH853> 'et-Chem אֵלָֽי׃ <WH413> 'e-Lai. about

וְעַתָּ֗ה <WH6258> ve-'at-Tah, Now אִם־ <WH518> 'im- if שָׁמ֤וֹעַ <WH8085> sha-Mo-a' Now therefore if ye will obey תִּשְׁמְעוּ֙ <WH8085> tish-me-'U indeed בְּקֹלִ֔י <WH6963> be-ko-Li, my voice וּשְׁמַרְתֶּ֖ם <WH8104> u-she-mar-Tem and keep אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- בְּרִיתִ֑י <WH1285> be-ri-Ti; my covenant וִהְיִ֨יתֶם <WH1961> vih-Yi-tem become לִ֤י li סְגֻלָּה֙ <WH5459> se-gul-Lah then ye shall be a peculiar treasure מִכָּל־ <WH3605> mik-kol all הָ֣עַמִּ֔ים <WH5971> ha-'am-Mim, unto me above all people כִּי־ <WH3588> ki- for לִ֖י li כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- for all הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> ha-'A-retz. for all the earth

וְאַתֶּ֧ם <WH859> ve-'at-Tem you תִּהְיוּ־ <WH1961> tih-yu- become לִ֛י li מַמְלֶ֥כֶת <WH4467> mam-Le-chet And ye shall be unto me a kingdom כֹּהֲנִ֖ים <WH3548> ko-ha-Nim of priests וְג֣וֹי <WH1471> ve-Goy nation קָד֑וֹשׁ <WH6918> ka-Doosh; and an holy אֵ֚לֶּה <WH428> 'El-leh another הַדְּבָרִ֔ים <WH1697> had-de-va-Rim, These [are] the words אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher you תְּדַבֵּ֖ר <WH1696> te-dab-Ber which thou shalt speak אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> be-Nei unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel

וַיָּבֹ֣א <WH935> vai-ya-Vo came מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh, And Moses וַיִּקְרָ֖א <WH7121> vai-yik-Ra and called לְזִקְנֵ֣י <WH2205> le-zik-Nei for the elders הָעָ֑ם <WH5971> ha-'Am; of the people וַיָּ֣שֶׂם <WH7760> vai-Ya-sem and laid לִפְנֵיהֶ֗ם <WH6440> lif-nei-Hem, before their faces אֵ֚ת <WH853> 'et כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all הַדְּבָרִ֣ים <WH1697> had-de-va-Rim all these words הָאֵ֔לֶּה <WH428> ha-'El-leh, these אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which צִוָּ֖הוּ <WH6680> tziv-Va-hu commanded יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. which the LORD

וַיַּעֲנ֨וּ <WH6030> vai-ya-'a-Nu answered כָל־ <WH3605> chol All הָעָ֤ם <WH5971> ha-'Am And all the people יַחְדָּו֙ <WH3162> yach-Dav together וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <WH559> vai-Yo-me-Ru, and said כֹּ֛ל <WH3605> kol All אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- after דִּבֶּ֥ר <WH1696> dib-Ber hath spoken יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh All that the LORD נַעֲשֶׂ֑ה <WH6213> na-'a-Seh; we will do וַיָּ֧שֶׁב <WH7725> vai-Ya-shev returned מֹשֶׁ֛ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh And Moses אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- דִּבְרֵ֥י <WH1697> div-Rei the words הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> ha-'Am of the people אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. unto the LORD

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer said יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to מֹשֶׁ֗ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh, unto Moses הִנֵּ֨ה <WH2009> hin-Neh Behold אָנֹכִ֜י <WH595> 'a-no-Chi I בָּ֣א <WH935> ba Lo I come אֵלֶיךָ֮ <WH413> 'e-lei-Cha unto בְּעַ֣ב <WH5645> be-'Av unto thee in a thick הֶֽעָנָן֒ <WH6051> he-'a-Nan cloud בַּעֲב֞וּר <WH5668> ba-'a-Vur so יִשְׁמַ֤ע <WH8085> yish-Ma' may hear הָעָם֙ <WH5971> ha-'Am that the people בְּדַבְּרִ֣י <WH1696> be-dab-be-Ri when I speak עִמָּ֔ךְ <WH5973> 'im-Mach, you וְגַם־ <WH1571> ve-gam- and may also בְּךָ֖ be-Cha יַאֲמִ֣ינוּ <WH539> ya-'a-Mi-nu with thee and believe לְעוֹלָ֑ם <WH5769> le-'o-Lam; thee for ever וַיַּגֵּ֥ד <WH5046> vai-yag-Ged told מֹשֶׁ֛ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh And Moses אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- דִּבְרֵ֥י <WH1697> div-Rei the words הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> ha-'Am of the people אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. unto the LORD

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer said יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to מֹשֶׁה֙ <WH4872> mo-Sheh unto Moses לֵ֣ךְ <WH1980> lech Go אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> ha-'Am, unto the people וְקִדַּשְׁתָּ֥ם <WH6942> ve-kid-dash-Tam and sanctify הַיּ֖וֹם <WH3117> hai-Yom them to day וּמָחָ֑ר <WH4279> u-ma-Char; and to morrow וְכִבְּס֖וּ <WH3526> ve-chib-be-Su and let them wash שִׂמְלֹתָֽם׃ <WH8071> sim-lo-Tam. their clothes

Sinai

וְהִגְבַּלְתָּ֤ <WH1379> ve-hig-bal-Ta And thou shalt set bounds אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָעָם֙ <WH5971> ha-'Am unto the people סָבִ֣יב <WH5439> sa-Viv round about לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> le-Mor, saying הִשָּׁמְר֥וּ <WH8104> hish-sha-me-Ru Take heed לָכֶ֛ם la-Chem עֲל֥וֹת <WH5927> a-Lot to yourselves [that ye] go [not] up בָּהָ֖ר <WH2022> ba-Har into the mount וּנְגֹ֣עַ <WH5060> u-ne-Go-a' or touch בְּקָצֵ֑הוּ <WH7097> be-ka-Tze-hu; the border כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- whoever הַנֹּגֵ֥עַ <WH5060> han-no-Ge-a' of it whosoever toucheth בָּהָ֖ר <WH2022> ba-Har the mount מ֥וֹת <WH4191> Mot shall be surely יוּמָֽת׃ <WH4191> yu-Mat. put to death

לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- No תִגַּ֨ע <WH5060> tig-Ga' touch בּ֜וֹ bo יָ֗ד <WH3027> Yad, There shall not an hand כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for סָק֤וֹל <WH5619> sa-Kol it but he shall surely יִסָּקֵל֙ <WH5619> yis-sa-Kel be stoned אוֹ־ <WH176> 'ov- or יָרֹ֣ה <WH3384> ya-Roh shot יִיָּרֶ֔ה <WH3384> yi-ya-Reh, through אִם־ <WH518> 'im- or בְּהֵמָ֥ה <WH929> be-he-Mah whether [it be] beast אִם־ <WH518> 'im- or אִ֖ישׁ <WH376> 'ish man לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo No יִחְיֶ֑ה <WH2421> yich-Yeh; it shall not live בִּמְשֹׁךְ֙ <WH4900> bim-shoCh soundeth long הַיֹּבֵ֔ל <WH3104> hai-yo-Vel, when the trumpet הֵ֖מָּה <WH1992> Hem-mah they יַעֲל֥וּ <WH5927> ya-'a-Lu they shall come up בָהָֽר׃ <WH2022> va-Har. to the mount

וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> vai-Yo-mer And he said אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> ha-'Am, unto the people הֱי֥וּ <WH1961> he-Yu Be נְכֹנִ֖ים <WH3559> ne-cho-Nim ready לִשְׁלֹ֣שֶׁת <WH7969> lish-Lo-shet against the third יָמִ֑ים <WH3117> ya-Mim; day אַֽל־ <WH408> 'al- not תִּגְּשׁ֖וּ <WH5066> tig-ge-Shu come אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- about אִשָּֽׁה׃ <WH802> 'ish-Shah. not at [your] wives

וַיְהִי֩ <WH1961> vay-Hi came בַיּ֨וֹם <WH3117> vai-Yom day הַשְּׁלִישִׁ֜י <WH7992> hash-she-li-Shi And it came to pass on the third בִּֽהְיֹ֣ת <WH1961> bih-Yot came הַבֹּ֗קֶר <WH1242> hab-Bo-ker, in the morning וַיְהִי֩ <WH1961> vay-Hi came קֹלֹ֨ת <WH6963> ko-Lot that there were thunders וּבְרָקִ֜ים <WH1300> u-ve-ra-Kim and lightnings וְעָנָ֤ן <WH6051> ve-'a-Nan cloud כָּבֵד֙ <WH3515> ka-Ved and a thick עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- upon הָהָ֔ר <WH2022> ha-Har, upon the mount וְקֹ֥ל <WH6963> ve-Kol and the voice שֹׁפָ֖ר <WH7782> sho-Far of the trumpet חָזָ֣ק <WH2389> cha-Zak loud מְאֹ֑ד <WH3966> me-'Od; exceeding וַיֶּחֱרַ֥ד <WH2729> vai-ye-che-Rad trembled כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> ha-'Am so that all the people אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher who בַּֽמַּחֲנֶֽה׃ <WH4264> Bam-ma-cha-Neh. that [was] in the camp
